definitions.definition: A visible substance believed to emanate from the body of a spiritualistic medium during communication with the dead .
An immaterial or ethereal substance, especially the transparent corporeal presence of a spirit or ghost .
The outer granule -free layer of cytoplasm .

main_definition: ( parapsychology ) A visible substance believed to emanate from the body of a spiritualistic medium during communication with the dead .
secondary_definitions: ( parapsychology ) An immaterial or ethereal substance, especially the transparent corporeal presence of a spirit or ghost .
( cytology ) The outer granule -free layer of cytoplasm .
